actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to apply to veterans and other persons pursuing certain vocational and technical educational programs the same certification and requirements with respect to enrollment, pursuit, and attendance as apply to veterans and persons pursuing programs leading to standard college degrees.

summary.text: Requires that there shall apply to veterans and other persons pursuing specified vocational and technical educational programs the same certification requirements with respect to enrollment, pursuit, and attendance as apply to veterans and persons pursuing programs leading to standard college degrees.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38 of the United States Code in order to apply to veterans and other persons pursuing certain vocational and technical educational programs the same certification and requirements with respect to enrollment, pursuit, and attendance as apply to veterans and persons pursuing programs leading to standard college degrees.
